StudiBuddy

    Featured Libraries/Languages
  • Semantic UI
  • FullCalendar
  • NPM
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • PHP
  • JQuery
  • AJAX
  • MySQL
  • Javascript

This was a solo full stack project that allowed a user to create unique login credentials and join or create a study group. Users were able to find a study group in a calendar entry based on class and subsequently view the location, number of members, and other pertinent details. A user was also able to create a new study group which created a calendar entry that allowed other users to join the group.
